name: The Absence of Is
description:
For the first time in human history, the living are able to make real attempts at studying the afterlife. Lead the first mission into this new frontier as a team of four researchers and scientists—are these visions just random neural firings, or are you really on your way to another world?

The Absence of Is was based on a novel of the same name by Jeffrey Klinicke, and was built in a month for Antholojam I - a curated anthology of short games themed after golden age science fiction. Other folks who worked on it: Kevin Maxon, Zoe Vartanian, Isa Hutchinson. Music by Michael Bell.
